about_the_game:
Embark on an epic action role-playing adventure in a world threatened by a dark vortex that generates darkness, threatening to destroy everything in its path.

Explore a rich and immersive story, where all life forms are in danger.

Search for mythical weapons (two swords, a bow, and a shield) and obtain legendary spells by defeating their guardians. Enchant your weapons with these spells' power to face increasingly greater challenges.

Use your wits to solve numerous puzzles that block your path.

Immerse yourself in majestic scenarios that include dungeons, fortresses, castles and labyrinths.

All the ingredients are here to live a great adventure in virtual reality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 2600 / 3600 or Intel i5 8600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060 / GTX 1660
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: OpenXR: designed for Rift s, Quest2/3/pro and Pico 4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3600x or Intel i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 / RTX 2080 / RTX 3060
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: OpenXR: designed for Rift s, Quest2/3/pro and Pico 4

short_description: Tales of Sintra is a classic action role-playing game designed for virtual reality. Embark on an epic quest to defeat the Dark Vortex: discover legendary weapons, master powerful spells, confront ancient guardians and solve intricate puzzles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
